subject: Self Care
title: Building a Self-Compassion Habit
description: One-minute skill: Building a Self-Compassion Habit.

hook.text: Self-compassion isn't a single moment. It's a daily practice, like brushing your teeth for emotional health.

buildup.text: Start with one daily touchpoint: a morning check-in, a self-compassion break, or an evening gratitude for yourself.

discovery.text: Research shows that eight weeks of self-compassion practice significantly reduces anxiety, depression, and self-criticism.

twist.text: You'll forget. You'll slip back into criticism. That itself is the moment to practice: 'It's okay. I'm learning.'

climax.text: Set a daily reminder. Practice for one minute. After eight weeks, self-compassion becomes your new default voice.

punchline.text: One minute daily. Eight weeks to a new default. Start today.

quiz.question: How long does consistent self-compassion practice take to create measurable change?
